love.name: Banana Pudding
love.description: A creamy dessert with a wonderful tropical flavor.

love.name: Chocolate Cake
love.description: Rich and moist with a thick fudge icing.

love.name: Monster Compendium
love.description: Monsters have a small chance to drop double loot.

love.name: Pumpkin
love.description: A fall favorite, grown for its crunchy seeds and delicately flavored flesh. As a bonus, the hollow shell can be carved into a festive decoration.

like.name: Ancient Sword
like.description: It's the remains of an ancient sword. Most of the blade has turned to rust, but the hilt is very finely crafted.

like.name: Bone Flute
like.description: It's a prehistoric wind instrument carved from an animal's bone. It produces an eerie tone.

like.name: Combat Quarterly
like.description: Read this to gain some combat experience.

like.name: Quartz
like.description: A clear crystal commonly found in caves and mines.

neutral.name: Chanterelle
neutral.description: A tasty mushroom with a fruity smell and slightly peppery flavor.

neutral.name: Daffodil
neutral.description: A traditional spring flower that makes a nice gift.

neutral.name: Dandelion
neutral.description: Not the prettiest flower, but the leaves make a good salad.

neutral.name: Ginger
neutral.description: This sharp, spicy root is said to increase vitality.

neutral.name: Leek
neutral.description: A tasty relative of the onion.

neutral.name: Magma Cap
neutral.description: A very rare mushroom that lives next to pools of lava.

neutral.name: Morel
neutral.description: Sought after for its unique nutty flavor.

neutral.name: Purple Mushroom
neutral.description: A rare mushroom found deep in caves.

neutral.name: Snow Yam
neutral.description: This little yam was hiding beneath the snow.

dislike.name: Sugar
dislike.description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

dislike.name: Wild Horseradish
dislike.description: A spicy root found in the spring.

hate.name: Holly
hate.description: The leaves and bright red berries make a popular winter decoration.
